name: Rose
details: Beautiful and classic flower with a pleasant fragrance.

name: Lily
details: Elegant and graceful flower symbolizing purity and renewal.

name: Daisy
details: Simple and charming flower that represents innocence.

name: Tulip
details: Colorful and vibrant flower with a unique shape.

name: Sunflower
details: Bright and cheerful flower that follows the sun.

name: Orchid
details: Exotic and delicate flower known for its beauty.
